nodes.excerpt:
1. Install Node.js Visit the Node.js download page and install Node.js. Click the button on the site to start the installation.  After the installation is complete, open your terminal and type the command .
If the Node.js version appears in the terminal, it means the installation was successful. (Note: Your Node.js version does not need to match mine exactly!)  2. Install Gatsby CLI Type the following command in the terminal to automatically install Gatsby CLI. Once you have completed the instâ€¦
